title: Case #2: The Haunting of Reginald Bonner
description: Ghost Diaries is a series of episodic short stories. This is Case #2 The Haunting of Reginald Bonner.Could someone experience a haunting and remain completely unaware? In the case of Reginald Bonner, investigator Taija Ford believes she's uncovered evidence revealing just such an event.Sometimes people don't realize what they have until it's too late, and if they refuse to believe the impossible, they might not comprehend the real danger until death stakes its claim.*** Warning this is an adult read. ***
author: Willow Cross
